      • checkIn

        public void checkIn()
             throws SignalAccessException,
                    AddressException
        used to checkIn, if this signal has been changed by the plc. If so, the signal change is automatically propagated to all connected signals
        Specified by:

      • checkOut

        public void checkOut()
              throws SignalAccessException,
                     AddressException
        used to check, if this signal has been changed by this jPac instance. If so, the signal change is propagated to the process image (data)
        Specified by:
